title: Boots

properties.name: description
properties.value: Boots are armour equippable in the feet slot. Below are some of the many different boots that players can wear in Old School RuneScape.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:BootsThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Boots
This article is about equipable boots. For other uses, see Boot (disambiguation).
For all items and their stats worn in this slot, see this table

Boots are armour equippable in the feet slot. Below are some of the many different boots that players can wear in Old School RuneScape.

Item Notes Level
requirement		 Members
20th anniversary boots Reward from 20th Anniversary event 0
Adamant boots Dropped by all variants of gargoyle 30 1
Ancient d'hide boots Blessed dragonhide armour from hard clues 40
70 		1
Armadyl d'hide boots
Bandos d'hide boots
Guthix d'hide boots
Saradomin d'hide boots
Zamorak d'hide boots
Angler boots Obtained from Fishing Trawler 34 1
Antisanta boots Reward from 2014 Christmas event 0
Bandos boots Bandos' army in the God Wars Dungeon 65 1
Bear feet Reward from beginner clues 0
Beekeeper's boots Reward from Beekeeper random event 0
Black boots Dropped by all variants of bloodveld 10 1
Bloodbark boots Bloodbark armour created from splitbark boots and blood runes 60
60 		1
Blue boots Fine Fashions in Tree Gnome Stronghold 1
Cream boots
Green boots
Pink boots
Turquoise boots
Boots of brimstone Made from using a drake claw on boots of stone 70
70
70
44 		1
Boots of darkness Robes of darkness, Reward from master clues 1
Boots of lightness Found in the Temple of Ikov dugeon. Reduces weight when equipped. 1
Boots of stone Purchased from Slayer masters for 200 coins 44 1
Bronze boots Dropped by all variants of cave crawler 1
Builder's boots Builder's costume obtained during Tower of Life quest 1
Carpenter's boots 200 carpenter points from Mahogany Homes, Experience-boosting set Carpenter's outfit 1
Citizen shoes Citizen outfit bought from Trader Sven 1
Climbing boots Purchased from Tenzing for 12 coins after starting Death Plateau quest 1
Climbing boots (g) Reward from medium clues 1
Clue hunter boots Obtained by digging near an oak tree south-west of the Fishing Guild, Clue hunter outfit 1
Decorative boots (gold) Castle Wars reward for 400 tickets 30 0
Decorative boots (white) Castle Wars reward for 40 tickets 20 0
Decorative boots (red) Castle Wars reward for 4 tickets 5 0
Desert boots Protects from desert heat 1
Devout boots Made from using a drake tooth on holy sandals 60 1
Dragon boots Only dropped by spiritual mages in God Wars Dungeon 60 1
Dragon boots (g) Dragon boots ornament kit attached to Dragon boots 60 1
Dragonstone boots A rare reward from the Elven Crystal Chest 40 1
Elven boots Elven outfit bought from Lliann's Wares for 10,000 coins. 1
Eternal boots Combining an eternal crystal with infinity boots 75
75 		1
Fancy boots Obtained by completing the Stronghold of Security 0
Fighting boots
Farmer's boots Tithe Farm reward for 50 points 1
Fremennik boots Purchased from Yrsa's Accoutrements after The Fremennik Trials quest 1
Fremennik sea boots 1 Reward from the easy Fremennik Diary 1
Fremennik sea boots 2 Reward from the medium Fremennik Diary
Fremennik sea boots 3 Reward from the hard Fremennik Diary
Fremennik sea boots 4 Reward from the elite Fremennik Diary
Frog-leather boots Purchased from Reldak's Leather Armour 25
25 		1
Gardening boots Drop from farmers 1
Ghostly boots Obtained from Kharrim after starting the Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest 1
Gilded boots A rare reward from elite clues 40 1
Golden prospector boots Cosmetic upgrade to prospector boots with 3,000 stardust for a star fragment in Dusuri's Star Shop 1
Graceful boots Bought from Grace's Graceful Clothing in the Rogues' Den. Part of Graceful clothing. 1
Graceful boots (Trailblazer) Graceful boots that are recoloured brown by using a Trailblazer graceful ornament kit on it.
Graceful boots (Agility Arena) Graceful boots that are recoloured dark blue by speaking to Pirate Jackie the Fruit for 250 agility arena tickets requiring the full set to be dyed.
Graceful boots (Hallowed) Graceful boots recoloured by using dark dye bought from Mysterious Stranger for 300 hallowed marks.
Graceful boots (Kourend) Graceful boots recoloured to white with 100% favour for every house of Great Kourend by talking to Osten with 15 marks of grace.
Graceful boots (Arceuus) Graceful cape recoloured to the house of Great Kourend of which the player has 100% favour in by talking to Osten with 15 marks of grace

Iron boots Dropped by all variants of cockatrice and cave slime 1
Leather boots Made with leather requiring 7 Crafting 0
Lumberjack boots Obtained during the Temple Trekking minigame by killing an undead lumberjack 1

Ranger boots Very rare reward from medium clues 40 1
Rock-shell boots Dropped by Giant Rock Crabs or King Sand Crabs 1
Rogue boots Rogue equipment, reward when looting the Wall safe in the Rogues' Den minigame 1

Runner boots Obtained by exchanging Honour Points from the Barbarian Assault minigame 40 1
Samurai boots Reward from master clues 1
Santa boots Reward from 2014 Christmas event 0
Shayzien boots (1) Dropped by the tier 1 soldier at the Combat ring in Shayzien 20 1

Spiked boots Created during Death Plateau 1

50 		1

Vyre noble shoes Obtained by coating unscented vyre noble shoes with blood when killing Damien Leucurte during Sins of the Father quest and after from the chest in the Myreque Hideout under Old Man Ral's house. 1
Vyrewatch shoes Purchased from Trader Sven in Meiyerditch 1
White boots Purchased from the White Knight Armoury after ranking up to Adept with 800 black knight kills after Wanted! 10 1
Wizard boots Reward from medium clues 20 1
Zealot's boots Zealot's robes from looting gold chests in the Shade Catacombs 1
Zombie boots Reward from the Gravedigger random event 1
